website_summaries.verdict: Gummies that taste good while providing high levels of vitamins D3 and K2 per serving.
pros: Ingredients include cholecalciferol, which is a natural form of vitamin D. Has a pomegranate flavor that most people love
Some people find the gummies easier to take versus soft gels or capsules
cons: Includes a lot of sugar in the gummies
Some people will not like the texture of the product

customer_reviews.title: D3/K2 What's not to love
customer_reviews.text: I take a different brand of D3/K2, but I give these to my son. He loves them and I am happy that they help keep the flu at bay instead of getting a toxic flu shot.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Kids love the taste
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for my 4 year old and 6 year old! I use these during cold/flu season! They love the taste and I love the ingredients
customer_reviews.author: Nurseandmommy

customer_reviews.title: First Order and Just Realized Nordic Naturals Made a D3/K2 Vitamin
customer_reviews.text: I was buying Nordic Naturals Vitamin D3 for awhile now when I saw on Amazon that they also make the D3/K2 (which is more of what I need because of Osteoporosis). Just got here to leave my review and saw that this vitamin may not appear on Amazon anymore. What??? Please don't stop selling these gummies on Amazon! I love Nordic Naturals and since I can't buy them in any store where I am, I come to Amazon to get these! This was my first order and I planned on coming back for more. FYI: Nordic Naturals products are all great!
customer_reviews.author: BlackHeartNY

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Very good it has the “D3” which is the good vitD and my kids love this
customer_reviews.author: DDDLC

customer_reviews.title: Too sugary
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the few D3/K2 chewable vitamins that had everything I wanted. And it’s from a brand I know and trust. My kids don’t complain. But I have tried them and they are overly sugary sweet. The sugar actually crunches on the outside when you chew it.
customer_reviews.author: H. Mercer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived (fast shipping) and they taste great, just maybe little bit too sweet. Sugarless option would be welcome.
customer_reviews.author: Janina

customer_reviews.title: Vitamins or gumdrops?
customer_reviews.text: I'd give 5 stars, but these vitamins look and taste like gumdrops. My kids love them! But along with 2 multivitamins, which also look like gumdrops, it's hard to feel good about giving them their vitamins!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya WIlbanks

customer_reviews.title: Great product flavor and quality
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor. I use these to bribe the kids to eat their other vitamins first! I wish it had less sugar put but otherwise it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica lagola

customer_reviews.title: Work good for D deficiency
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I didn't care for was how sugary they were. The manufacturer could decrease the sugar significantly. As far as absorbancy my daughter was D deficient and then re checked after taking these for 3 months and now is at the normal range!
customer_reviews.author: victoria

customer_reviews.title: I believe rhey are soing their job
customer_reviews.text: These don't taste nearly as good as the D3 Wild Berry flavored gummies: however, I am tking them with a lot of othr vitamins. I can tell youbthat I am till healthy during this COVID-19 pandemic, so i believe they are working well. Just wish they tasted better.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These gummies are so tasty you have to stop yourself from eating them all up like candy. This is a quality product. I have had no problems taking them. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: A palatable way to get your vitamin D
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always had unusually low vitamin D levels, but I never really tried doing anything about it until studies started finding that people with low vitamin D levels were prone to complications from COVID-19. Since I’ve started taking these bad boys, I swear I’m like Wolverine now. My fingernails grow in thick and quickly, and I never break them anymore. Have they brought up my vitamin D levels? Probably, but I haven’t had any blood work done to check. Have they protected me from COVID complications? Who knows. What I do know is that if I stop clipping my nails, I could probably turn to a life of crime-fighting.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: The sunshine vitamin
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grand daughter. D3 for overall health especially during the winter and K2 as the traffic cop to direct calcium into the bones and teeth. D3 also absorbs calcium from the diet but k2 puts it in the right place.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like Candy....
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if these help my kiddos but they do love them! They taste like candy not vitamins so be sure to hide these babies!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: A-M-A-Z-I-N-G  T-A-S-T-E!!!
customer_reviews.text: LITERALLY THE BEST TASTING VITAMIN IVE HAD IN MY LIFE, and I’ve had A LOT!! I’m adding this to my permanent auto shipping!
customer_reviews.author: bilcot

customer_reviews.title: Great gummies!!
customer_reviews.text: Vitamin D with K! Perfect. And gummies! And my kids love the flavor!!
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Nordic Natural Vitamin D3 Plus K2 Gummies Are Great!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these Nordic gummy vitamins. They taste great and are easy to chew and dissolve quickly!
customer_reviews.author: cutiepie71

customer_reviews.title: Great taste!
customer_reviews.text: Taste is great! Very soft and easy to chew. They do not stick together in bottle - easy to get just one out.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie L.

customer_reviews.title: Chewable for adults!
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find a D vitamin with K in it, especially a chewable version. Buy these all the time for my husband who is D deficient, and also picky about swallowing.
customer_reviews.author: carla

customer_reviews.title: Taste Good
customer_reviews.text: My son liked these so they were easy to give to him.
customer_reviews.author: JHenson

customer_reviews.title: good product great it hs vitamin k
customer_reviews.text: very yummy but only ha 1,oo its of vitamin d and you reeky need 10,000 ius so i just eat more of them tasty too the vitamin k is great for people like me that have had colon surgery
customer_reviews.author: Reliable in Nova

customer_reviews.title: This product agrees with my body system.
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for strengthing my vitamin D intake
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Easy way to get vitamins
customer_reviews.text: These are not chewy like gummies, but they are an easy way to get the right amount (for me) of Vitamin D and K2. I have trouble swallowing pills and capsules unless they are very small.
customer_reviews.author: amznfan

customer_reviews.title: taste good and easy to take
customer_reviews.text: these are very tasty and I like the fact that they contain D3 plus K2.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Adler

customer_reviews.title: Yum.
customer_reviews.text: Very delicious tasting . I wanted to eat the entire contents at once, but I restrained myself to two a day....only one is necessary, though
customer_reviews.author: Lois W.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and taste good
customer_reviews.text: I really like this brand of supplements and my daughter liked the flavor. Hoping this will help keep colds away this winter.
customer_reviews.author: TMC

customer_reviews.title: A good D3/K2 Gummie for kids
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey, but kids like it. Not always in stock.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Flavour is great, texture is a little weird
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is an excellent vitamin combo, but it's too expensive to buy at the rate I need.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting gummy!
customer_reviews.text: They taste great! I use them for both my children and myself during an illness and it seems to help us all heal faster!
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Fendt

customer_reviews.title: Taste great!
customer_reviews.text: This brand is one of my favorites. All of their products taste great and my kids never complain about taking them
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Yummy. So tasty I could eat more than one but resist.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these gummies, but they are just too sweet and gooey.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too sweet
customer_reviews.text: I usually love Nordic but these are covered in so much sugar that it makes them gross to take. Literally, sweeter than candy:(
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Young

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Has a nice taste to them. It is better than liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Caladona

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: These aren't really gummies. They taste ok, but they are not gummies, just soft.
customer_reviews.author: Basil

customer_reviews.title: It's chewable.
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was later than I expected, but I like this for me and my child.
customer_reviews.author: Iri

customer_reviews.title: I am glad its the original brand and not a knock off.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the D3 product for years and decided to try this one that includes the K2. Have been pleased w/the D3 and cannot wait to see if I feel a difference w/the additional K2.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Allergen friendly !
customer_reviews.text: Kids love these! And I love how they are free from peanuts and tree nuts and coconut !!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Manvydas

customer_reviews.title: My daughter eats one gummy per day and absolutely loves ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter eats one gummy per day and absolutely loves them! Sometimes I substitute part of my D3 supplement for a gummy! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: There isn't anything that I don't like about these gummies. My kids love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they taste great but that is because the first ingredient is ORGANIC ...
customer_reviews.text: Everyone is right... they taste great but that is because the first ingredient is ORGANIC CANE SUGAR, not something i had expected when purchasing these vitamins. If you want great tasting vitamins, purchase these but your purchasing basically sugar which has no benefit to a vitamin itself. You are kinda defeating the purpose of eating a vitamin. Bummed because thought highly of this brand. Off in search of something better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gross!! Covered in SUGAR!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are covered in sugar! What the heck?? I’m paying more for a good company that I trust just to give my toddler what is basically candy? I don’t do sugar in our house unless it’s a bday or holiday so why would I continue to buy this product to start her day off on a sugar rush! Seriously with being trapped inside all day because of covid sugary vitamins are the last thing we need. Would not buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Winston55

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: I see a naturalist doctor who recommended vitamin D3 plus K2 to get the most benefit of Vitamin D. I can only take gummy vitamins because of a stomach issue. These are the only ones that looked good and taste great. I will continue to buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Mizdiagnosed

customer_reviews.title: She will chew them, but not her favorite.
customer_reviews.text: I needed something she could use for calcium, this sometimes does the trick,
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: A nice product of vitamin D
customer_reviews.text: I like this brand and have been using their products for 2 years. Recently I need to get Vitamin D product and discovered they have one wit K2. This is exactly what I am looking for. Came faster than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Mamalid

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Not a big vitamin person but the flavor is nice and the don’t leave an after taste
customer_reviews.author: Tjack

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize they were sugar/crystal-coated but the flavor is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: SSD

customer_reviews.title: Very Palatable and High Quality
customer_reviews.text: These little vities are the bomb . Way too easy to take and they taste good . I bruise less easily with the K supplement
customer_reviews.author: Boulderchick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: My favorite vitamin to take. You can't be deficient on Vitamin D when they taste this good! I love that they're combined with K2 for better absorption.
customer_reviews.author: Tara B.

customer_reviews.title: Taste Great
customer_reviews.text: I have had gummy vitamins before and they sometime have a cough syrup taste to them, but these taste like gum drops.
customer_reviews.author: Capri8668

customer_reviews.title: Tasty!
customer_reviews.text: This is so tasty, my boy thinks it’s a dessert, he eats all the other vitamins and save this for last 😂
customer_reviews.author: Meme78

customer_reviews.title: Not really a gummy
customer_reviews.text: Not true gummies, just very soft and strong tasting. They are coated with sugar. The taste is ok but the texture is the part I don’t like, I will be trying another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Rolled in sugar
customer_reviews.text: They have rolled the gummy in sugar. When i removed the sugar, it actually tasted better. It feels like I am taking the most unhealty vitamin.
customer_reviews.author: mahvash armand

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for kids with D deficiency and adults as well.
customer_reviews.author: Pet Lin Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Great vitamins!
customer_reviews.text: We love these quality vitamins; it's hard to find D3 with the added K2 for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gummy.
customer_reviews.text: Tasty, sweet. Take one a day or three a day. I take 3 in the morning as I leave for work. Calcium is needed as energy.
customer_reviews.author: Gear

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious. I have to hide them from my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great taste and fun way to get vitamin D3 with K2.
customer_reviews.author: JAS

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: The taste is great! I take other vitamins along with this, but I believe I feel the positive effects.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Tastes amazing and so good for you too
customer_reviews.text: My family loves Nordic Naturals! Tastes amazing and so good for you too. Thank you 😊
customer_reviews.author: Laura M. Castles

customer_reviews.title: They taste yummy.
customer_reviews.text: They taste yummy. Its hard to say if they are working but we are hoping to see improved dental health in our future
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: delivery time was excellent! Quality of service was great thank you
customer_reviews.text: Thank you very much, delivery time was excellent! Quality of service was great thank you, God bless
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting!
customer_reviews.text: My entire family loves these. Even my boys who are very fussy, ages 10 & 13. Great tasting!
customer_reviews.author: kcS2285

customer_reviews.title: Great Gummy Vitamin
customer_reviews.text: Great gummy vitamin! My 2.5 year old loves eating them.
customer_reviews.author: Callie Miller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and they are very tasty too! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jeaneen McGuire

product_meta.title: Nordic Naturals Vitamin D3 Plus K2 Gummies - Vitamin D3 from Natural Cholecalciferol for Optimal Calcium Absorption With Vitamin K2, Supports Formation of Healthy Bones, Pomegranate Flavor, 60 Count
feature_bullets: These delicious gummies, with the natural flavor of pomegranate, are made from cholecalciferol, the natural form of vitamin D
Nordic Naturals Vitamin D3+K2 Gummies provides 1000 I.U. of vitamin D3 and 45 mcg of Vitamin K2 in each serving
Nordic Naturals Vitamin D3+K2 Gummies come in a delicious, natural pomegranate flavor. Pectin based and gelatin free
